name: Button Butt
description:
玩家通过点击拖拽小蜘蛛，使之移动到终点与大蜘蛛相遇。游戏玩法类似于缝衣服，这条线在正面，那么下条线就在反面。当遇到障碍时，蜘蛛将无法通行，所以要避免连线中出现与线同一面的障碍物。（其中纽扣是存在于两面的障碍物）游戏目前共有5关，玩家挑战前面的关卡成功即可解锁后面的关卡。

Click and drag the spider to help her to meet another spider in the end. The rule of this game is similar to sewing clothes.If this line is on the front, the next line will be on the reverse side. When encountering an obstacle, the spider will not be able to pass, so avoid obstacles on the same side as the line. (The huge button is the obstacle that exists on both sides.) The game currently has 5 levels in total. Players can challenge the previous level to unlock the next level.
